text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump How much did it cost the taxpayers? The Trump campaign should be paying this bill. Meanwhile he's stealing from the coffers that should pay to save #COVID19 patients. #TrumpDoctrine: SNAFU. Inept. Incompetent. Immoral. Ignorant.
